name: JUMPOX
description:
JUMPOX is a minimalist pixel-art platformer with a unique and much fun gameplay.

Platforms shrink as you touch them, but your jump stamina is limited as well. Do the math!

There are six different types of platforms that make life easier or harder for you.

Find levers to activate the elevators or open the gates.


Getting the key is a must to unlock the gate to finish the level.

And lots of other fun material, not to mention the secret eggs.

HAVE FUN!
